refnamediv.refpurpose: Executes a block of code when an "if...then" condition is false.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Executes a block of code when an "if...then" condition is false.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: else is used inside of a block of code between the "if...then" and endif opcodes. It defines which statements are executed when a "if...then" condition is false. Only one else statement may occur and it must be the last conditional statement before the endif opcode.
